metadata.inclusion:
1. Start inclusion
2. Press the Z-Wave button 3 times (located between + and - buttons)
3. The LED will turn off when added
metadata.exclusion:
1. Start exclusion
2. Press the Z-Wave button 3 times
3. The LED will turn on when removed
metadata.reset: Hold the Z-Wave button for about 10 seconds. The LED will turn on when reset is complete
